events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles focusing on software development and backend systems.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be your point of contact throughout the interview process.
Your initial screening call was completed successfully; you demonstrated a strong understanding of software engineering principles.
You responded promptly to the interview invitation and expressed enthusiasm for proceeding to the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC to assess your coding and system design skills.
You completed the technical interview with strong performance and clear problem-solving abilities that met our expectations.
Your HR interview is scheduled for April 24th at 3 PM UTC to discuss culture fit and compensation details.
The HR interview was successful, and you expressed alignment with our company values and benefits.
We have sent you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including salary and bonus details for your consideration.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions regarding your start date and benefits.
Congratulations on accepting our offer! We look forward to welcoming you to the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with access to company resources and an introductory meeting scheduled for your first day.
All recruitment steps are successfully completed. You have officially been hired as a Software Engineer at the company.
